name: PiP (M_rld)
description:
PiP is a short puzzle game about pushing dice around to solve various puzzles.

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow keys | Move
  • Z | Undo
  • R | Reset
  • ESC | Pause
  • Space / Enter | Confirm

(Also, for the level selection screen, you switch between levels using the left and right keys)

Made in 50 hours for GMTK Gam Jam 2022
